About.Hours & facilities: Open Thurs 1-4pm and the 2nd Thurs of each month 6:30-8pm; closed mid December until the beginning of February each year. General reference assistance available. General copying services available. Referral to paid researchers is available. Introductory brochure available.

About.Access: Records can be used in room.

About.Acquisition focus: Regional history - photographic and written only. (40% in-house).

About.Major holdings: Newspapers (Microfilm) 1836- . Birth Deaths and Marriages, South Australian Index (Microfiche) 1842-1916. Church Records (Microfiche) 1848- . Council Records 1857- . Books 1880- . Clare BD&M registers 1857-1906 (births), 1857-1916 (marriages), 1857-1970 (deaths).
